lines.text: I like this book. Ain't got no pictures in it.
Maybe this'll help you out. There's only two guys know who did the shootin' and one of them's dead, and the other one's gonna be if he don't keep his trap shut...

[after shining his shoes]
There you are, Pop. There's one you can see your face in.
What I want is one I can see YOUR face in.
Aw pee yourself, Frankie! Here's one guy that's cut all his teeth.
Well how'd you like to have me shove 'em down your throat for you?
